stimulusHtml: Write, but do not evaluate, an expression for the average distance between the two particles on the interval 1≤t≤3.

features.html: Two particles move along the x-axis. For 0≤t≤6 , the position of particle P at time t is given by p(t)=2cos(π/4t ), while the position of particle R at time t is given by r(t)=t3-6t2+9t+3.
